questions.question: What is the main source of returns in a Ponzi scheme?
options: Profitable investments
Money from new investors
Bank loans

questions.question: What is a key difference between a Ponzi scheme and a pyramid scheme?
options: Ponzi schemes are legal, while pyramid schemes are not.
Pyramid schemes require participants to recruit new members.
Ponzi schemes only invest in real estate.
questions.correctAnswer: Pyramid schemes require participants to recruit new members.

questions.question: What is a common red flag of a Ponzi scheme?
options: High, consistent returns with little risk
Transparent business model
SEBI registration
questions.correctAnswer: High, consistent returns with little risk

questions.question: What eventually happens to all Ponzi schemes?
options: They become legitimate businesses.
They are taken over by the government.
They collapse when they can't attract enough new investors.
questions.correctAnswer: They collapse when they can't attract enough new investors.

questions.question: Who was Charles Ponzi?
options: A famous economist.
The creator of the first mutual fund.
An infamous fraudster who ran a large-scale postage stamp scheme.
questions.correctAnswer: An infamous fraudster who ran a large-scale postage stamp scheme.

questions.question: What is the best way to protect yourself from Ponzi schemes?
options: Invest a small amount first to see if you get returns.
Be skeptical of promises of high, guaranteed returns and do your own research.
Only invest in schemes recommended by friends.
questions.correctAnswer: Be skeptical of promises of high, guaranteed returns and do your own research.

questions.question: What is the role of SEBI in relation to Ponzi schemes?
options: SEBI insures investors against losses from Ponzi schemes.
SEBI does not regulate Ponzi schemes.
SEBI investigates and takes action against illegal investment schemes.
questions.correctAnswer: SEBI investigates and takes action against illegal investment schemes.

questions.question: What is a common characteristic of a pyramid scheme?
options: A focus on selling a high-quality product.
A complex commission structure based on recruitment.
A low, one-time entry fee.
questions.correctAnswer: A complex commission structure based on recruitment.

questions.question: What was the Saradha Group chit fund scam?
options: A successful investment fund.
A massive Ponzi scheme that defrauded thousands of investors.
A government-run savings program.
questions.correctAnswer: A massive Ponzi scheme that defrauded thousands of investors.

questions.question: What should you do if you suspect an investment scheme might be a Ponzi or pyramid scheme?
options: Invest a large amount to maximize your potential returns.
Report it to the authorities, such as SEBI or the police.
Keep it to yourself so you don't cause a panic.
questions.correctAnswer: Report it to the authorities, such as SEBI or the police.
